company_description: Be part of Innovating to Impact. This is your invitation to the never before…

title: User Research Manager - Commercial Digital
description:
**Let's introduce ourselves**
-----------------------------



At Volvo Cars, we are on an ambitious journey to rethink the software-defined car, the eco-system around it and how we connect with our customers. We aim to operate in the automotive world by creating electrified and sustainable products, with a digital ecosystem built around making our customers’ lives less complicated. We are looking for curious, creative people who want to change the world through innovative thinking.

  


**What you'll do**
------------------



We are looking for a User Research Manager who will report of the Head of User Research and will lead a team of multi-disciplinary research professionals focused on experience that support our marketing and operations teams, and help people have a better experience owning a car. Some of the experiences include the Volvo Cars website, the Driving journal features in the app and the how people order a service on their car.

  


You will mentor and development of a diverse set of researchers that will work closely with various product teams. You will have a strong collaboration with design and product partners and can push for the right level of research. You will guide your teams to be curious, responsive and impactful, helping the product team make customer centric decisions quickly, using the right process for the questions at hand. You will be part of the broader Research community, championing efficient and correct process and driving data-informed decisions.

  


**What you'll bring**
---------------------


* Proven experience in UX research and experience of leading multi-disciplinary research teams
* Experience in working with design, product, marketing and engineering teams
* Good knowledge of design processes and different user research techniques
* Skilled in collecting various data, creating cohesive insights, and presenting them clearly
* Have experience with managing stakeholders in large and complex organizations
* Have contributed extensively to strategy and planning
* Have a proven experience in delivering research outputs on time and contributing to informing and shaping the vision of key stakeholders
* Speak and write fluent English
**Location**
------------



Gothenburg HQ or Stockholm Tech Hub.

  


**Application**
---------------



Applicants must provide a portfolio of work as part of their application.

  


**Volvo Cars – driving change together**  

Volvo Cars’ success is the result of a collaborative, diverse and inclusive working environment. Today, we’re one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with around 43,000 employees across the globe. At Volvo Cars, your career is designed around your skills and aspirations, so you can reach your fullest potential.

  


And it’s so exciting – we’re well on our way on our journey towards full electrification. We have five fully electric cars already on the market, and five more on the way. Our fully-electric and plug-in hybrid cars combined make up almost 50 per cent of our sales. So come and join us in shaping the future of mobility. There’s never been a more rewarding time to play your part in our inspiring and creative teams!
company_description: At Volvo Car Group, our vision is clear: "To be the world's most progressive and desired premium car brand".

title: Product owner & super user online
description:
DOZ Apotek letar nu efter nästa stjärna till rollen som Product owner & super user online till vårt kontor i Stockholm.


Som produktägare och super user för online kommer du att spela en central roll i utvecklingen och optimeringen av DOZ Apoteks e-handel. Du kommer att vara länken mellan vårt tekniska team och verksamheten där du ansvarar för att säkerställa att våra e-handelslösningar ligger i framkant och lever upp till våra affärsmål samt ger en fantastisk användarupplevelse. Som Super User har du även djup förståelse för våra e-handelssystem och fungerar som intern expert och support för kollegor i organisationen.

**Ansvarsområden**

* Ansvara för utveckling och implementering av nya funktioner och förbättringar i våra e-handelskanaler.
* Säkerställa en sömlös användarupplevelse och optimal prestanda, samt arbeta mot att förbättra användarupplevelsen och konverteringsgraden.
* Samverka med IT, design och andra avdelningar för att driva projekt från idé till lansering.
* Prioritera backlog samt genomföra kravställning och dokumentation för nya funktioner och uppdateringar.
* Genomföra tester (UAT) av nya funktioner och bugfixar innan lansering. Ansvara för deploy och release från företagets sida.
* Agera super user för CMS (Magento) och andra relevanta system, vilket innebär att du felsöker, ger intern support och utbildning för teammedlemmar och övriga intressenter.
* Analysera och följa upp kring kundresan och ny funktionalitet.
* Driva konverteringsoptimering genom att arbeta med hypoteser och testning.

**Erfarenhet & kompetens**

* Stark erfarenhet av att arbeta med prioritering och kravhantering.
* Erfarenhet av digitala plattformar och verktyg samt kunskaper kring utveckling så som HTML och CSS.
* Språk: svenska och engelska.
* Önskvärt är att du även har erfarenheter kring bildhantering, UX/UI, konverteringsoptimering och Magento.

**Personliga egenskaper**

* Lösningsorienterad och självgående med förmåga att hantera flera projekt samtidigt, driva initiativ, prioritera uppgifter, hantera tidslinjer och uppfylla deadlines i en snabbrörlig miljö.
* En utmärkt lagspelare som trivs med att samarbeta och hjälpa olika avdelningar.
* Ett intresse för att driva förändring och utveckla den bästa tänkbara användarupplevelsen för e-handel.


Du delar dessutom DOZ Apoteks värderingar: *Tillsammans, Nytänkande, Ansvar, Respekt, Kunden i centrum.*

**Vi erbjuder**


Hos oss på DOZ Apotek får du vara med om ett spännande kapitel då vi är en starkt växande aktör inom apoteksbranschen i Sverige. Vi erbjuder en marknadsmässig lön, trevliga kontorslokaler vid Södra station och härliga kollegor!


Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med tillämpad provanställning på 6 månader. Intervjuer kommer ske löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Senast ansökningsdag 31 januari 2025. Har du frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta vår e-handelschef Tobias Hanner, tobias.hanner@dozapotek.se


Välkommen in med din ansökan!

title: Social Media Specialist
description:
**About Making Science**
Making Science is an international digital acceleration company with over 1,200 experts across 15 markets, including Spain, Portugal, Mexico, Colombia, France, Italy, the UK, Ireland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Finland, Germany, Georgia, and the USA. As a proud consulting partner of Local Planet — the world’s premier network of independent media agencies — we deliver a suite of digital, technology, and performance marketing services to a global clientele. Our expertise spans digital marketing and MarTech, software and cloud solutions, artificial intelligence, and SaaS, all underscored by a relentless pursuit of innovation.  

  

Making Science was ranked 15th in the FT1000: Europe's Fastest-Growing Companies 2023. Committed to making a positive impact, Making Science actively engages in various ESG initiatives. We’ve joined forces with the Climate Pledge, the United Nations Global Compact, and Pledge1%, dedicating resources and efforts to support non-profit organizations. Through these endeavors, we are committed to driving meaningful change for a brighter, more sustainable future.  

  

As part of its commitment to innovation, Making Science offers its clients end-to-end capabilities required for consulting, development, integration, and maintenance of advanced IT solutions. Our global network of delivery hubs not only fosters job growth but also serves as an incubator for cultivating top-tier tech talent, fueling projects that accelerate transformation and modernisation.  

  

Our team is composed of digital native professionals, who have a wide knowledge in the different stages and disciplines of the digital transformation: Digital Strategy, Infrastructures, Software Development, Creativity and UX/UI Design, Digital Marketing, and Big Data.  

  

Making Science is People Centric, and we actively bet on our employees! We believe that they are the key to any successful business, and therefore, our greatest asset. We strive to provide daily learning opportunities for those who work with us and their colleagues. It is also really important that they enjoy what they do, and have positive experiences. We want our employees to feel proud of their accomplishments, and that they belong to a company that is in constant growth, because each person’s contribution is essential to achieve our success. Do you want to be part of this great family?
**Some details about your department**
--------------------------------------



At Social Media, we focus mainly on building a brand's voice through content and interaction on different social channels. We look for profiles that are sharp, and that have the capability to think critically and adapt quickly to projects that are really diverse: from the creation of content strategies on a brand's different channels to the development of interaction and social listening dynamics.  

In this department, analytical capabilities are as important as creativity. Our projects always start by analyzing the audience, the market, and the competition to gain a deep understanding of the media and digital channels. Our proposals stand out strategically, and rely on measurable data.  

Our objective is to always offer our clients effectiveness in their messages, and work with them to build a credible brand in a competitive environment.
**What we’d like you to do**
----------------------------



Strategically plan, manage and optimize account structure and campaigns in all social channels and platforms  

Make sure that all client updates are done in a timely and accurate manner  

Deliver reports based on the analysis of campaign data (DataStudio, Excel)  

Coordinate internally across different departments  

Design and execute client’s media plan  

Contribute to client business growth by identifying new opportunities and communicating creative solutions to planning teams  

Create and present client-facing material to support media planning cycles
**What we’d like you to bring**
-------------------------------



At least 1-2 year of experience in a similar role working with performance campaings.  

Great knowledge on various social media plattforms (Meta, TikTok, LinkedIn, etc.)  

Experience from working with performance focused clients in social, such as e-commerce clients  

Good understanding of how to implement tracking and events on Meta and Tiktok  

Certifications in Meta (planning and/or buying) – not required but would be great.  

You have an advanced level of English.  

You are highly familiar with Google Analytics.  

**Perks of joining us**
Our office is centrally located in the middle of the city in Stockholm.
We offer a fixed salary according to your worth and experience.
With us you will get Health care allowance and service pension via our partner Max Matthiessen.
Do you know someone that fits in Making Science? Refer him or her, and you can get a bonus if they’re hired!
Feedback is part of our day to day lives. We recognize a job well done through a continuous feedback model.
You will always have the opportunity to be involved and influence your daily work.
The opportunity to meet our international team with our Ambassadors Program.
We care about a healthy work-life balance. You can count on having flexible working hours and the possibility of hybrid work.
You will never stop learning with us: subsidized training, free language classes, learning capsules, an e-learning platform, and manymore.
We know how to have a good time!
We have a joint Friday breakfast together every week.
Take a break in our lounge area, play foosball, pool, or PlayStation.
Be a part of a young, adventurous, and professional team, with people you’ll grow fond of!

title: Business Expert - Successfactors - Digital People Lifecycle
description:
**Company Description**  

H&M is one of the biggest fashion companies in the world. We are a family of brands, driven by our mission to make a sustainable lifestyle an option for the many. With our customers at heart, we offer fashion, design, and services to millions of customers every day.


We believe that it’s when you mix and match different talents, experiences, and styles that the real magic happens. That’s why our teams are built with different personalities, talents and people from all kinds of backgrounds. If you are willing to learn, grow and help our customers and your colleagues, H&M will always be a place for you to both express your individuality and feel like you belong. Be yourself & more at H&M.


We are on a journey to create the best people organization in the industry. Digital People Life Cycle team as a part of our Central People Organization with the objective to deliver the most impactful, holistic and customer centric colleague journey. Digital People Life Cycle is home for a diverse group of digital HR professionals, who work together towards our common people strategy and vision.


As part Digital People Life Cycle, you will play a pivotal role in empowering seamless and impactful colleague experiences by aligning digital HR strategies with our core values and technology. You will be part of the HXM team that develop and implement solutions on the Successfactors HRIS connected to the surrounding tech eco system. The team mission is to optimize HR processes through automation and self-service, and ensuring a relevant and intuitive experience for employees throughout the colleague lifecycle.

 **Job Description**  

* Analyze the business requirements and create updated process and requirements documentation
* Part of problem management team
* Lead, create supporting documentation and plan testing and other quality assurance activities
* Creating and conducting training of SF functionality and processes
* Support the global super user and country super user network
* Responsible for the communication to stakeholders and users about new features/initiatives.
* Work with the product back-log
* Contribute with Successfactors EC expertise in various forums for project and maintenance.
* You will work to achieve progress and secure the content in the process and the solution. All with the aim to maximize business impact, benefits, and effects to reach our targets
* You will be a project leader and drive/coordinate cross functional process changes & solution deliverables

  

**Qualifications**  

* Expert in Successfactors Employee Central (Admin certification is merit) and other modules connected to the people administration perspective (Onboarding 2.0, Document management).
* Detailed knowledge on SuccessFactors best practice implementation and UI and UX elements (Home page, people profile and workflow)
* Experience of other SuccessFactors concepts and modules for performance and talent management
* Good knowledge on integrations, RBP and access management
* Strong stakeholder management and communication skills.
* Ability to take responsibility and work proactively in a complex, continuously changing environment.
* Experience in Jira, ServiceNow, TeamShift & Miro
* Independent and self-driven takes responsibility and accountability in reaching our deliverables across the function.
* Have a business and customer-oriented mindset with the motivation to constantly improve, achieve targets and drive agenda forward.

  

**Additional Information**  

H&M is a workplace where you’ll join a global fashion family that combines teamwork with individual expression and gives you the challenges and opportunities that can help you learn, grow and succeed.


We believe that it’s when you mix and match different talents, experiences, and styles that the real magic happens. That’s why our teams are built with different personalities, talents and people from all kinds of backgrounds. If you are willing to learn, grow and help our customers and your colleagues, H&M will always be a place for you to both express your individuality and feel like you belong.


We also believe that you can’t change the world without great people on your side. So, we offer all our employee's generous benefits, lots of learning opportunities and the possibility to start building a more long-term career. Bring your whole personality to work, stay as long as you want, and grow more than you ever thought was possible. Be yourself & more at H&M.


We look forward to receiving your application!

title: UX/UI Designer - Stockholm
description:
AcadeMedia söker en erfaren UX/UI Designer som kan stärka vårt digitala designteam. I den här rollen ansvarar du för att skapa, utveckla och optimera användarupplevelser på våra webbplattformar, med särskilt fokus på UI-design och användarcentrerad metodik.



AcadeMedia drivs av människor som vill skapa ett bättre och mer hållbart samhälle, där utbildning och lärande är grunden. Vår vision är att leda utvecklingen av framtidens utbildning. Tillsammans förser vi barn, elever och vuxna med kunskaper och verktyg för att forma sin framtid. Vi är övertygade om att utbildning kan skapa verklig förändring för både individer och hela samhällen – vi kallar det "Utbildning som transformerar."


**Startdatum:** Från januari 2025.  

**Placering:** Stockholm


**Ansvarsområden:**


* Utforma tydliga och visuellt tilltalande gränssnitt för webb och andra digitala kanaler, med hänsyn till tillgänglighet och responsivitet.
* Genomföra användarundersökningar, användartester och samla in feedback för att fatta insiktsbaserade designbeslut.
* Samarbeta nära produktägare, utvecklare och andra intressenter för att omvandla idéer till detaljerade UI-koncept och interaktiva prototyper.
* Underhålla och vidareutveckla designriktlinjer, komponentbibliotek och stilguider.
* Löpande iterera design utifrån data och användarinsikter för att förbättra användbarhet och estetik.
* Animationer och interaktivitet.
* Leda möten och presentera designkoncept, resultat och rekommendationer för beslutsfattare och andra intressenter.


**Krav:**


* Gedigen kunskap inom UI/UX-designprinciper och erfarenhet av vanliga designverktyg, med hög specialistkompetens i Figma.
* En stark portfolio som visar användarcentrerade designprocesser, visuell expertis och framgångsrika UI-implementationer.
* Förmåga att uttrycka dig mycket väl i både tal och skrift på engelska och svenska.
* Erfarenhet av responsiv design och god kännedom om WCAG-standarder för tillgänglighet.
* Kännedom om agila arbetssätt och vana att arbeta tvärfunktionellt.
* God analytisk förmåga med förmågan att balansera användarbehov, affärsmål och tekniska förutsättningar.
* Erfarenhet av att leda diskussioner, klargöra krav och presentera idéer för olika intressentgrupper.


**Övrig information:**  

Du kommer att arbeta i ett internationellt team där både engelska och svenska används i kommunikationen. Detta skapar en dynamisk arbetsmiljö där samarbete och mångfald värderas högt.



Om du är en engagerad och noggrann UX/UI Designer som kan ta initiativ och höja användarupplevelsen för våra digitala plattformar ser vi fram emot din ansökan. Du ska vara en lagspelare med god kommunikationsförmåga och ett genuint intresse för att leverera användarvänliga lösningar av hög kvalitet.



Är detta din nästa utmaning? Ansök nu och bli en del av vårt team!

title: Senior Product Manager
description:
Every year, 6 billion SEK of personal accident insurance compensation goes unclaimed in Sweden! Why so?
  
Navigating the insurance claims process is often complicated, requiring time, knowledge, and patience. At Insurello, we empower customers to get more value from their insurance through personalized insights and innovative solutions. We've already helped over 43,000 people claim more than 900 million SEK, and our customer count continues to grow every hour.
  
We believe our product has the potential to transform an industry often seen as complex and opaque, offering a digital solution that makes life easier for millions of people. Now, we are looking for an empathetic and strategic Senior Product Manager to lead our product to the next level.
  
The Role
  
Insurello is on a mission to continuously improve its customer promise and product offering. Whether enhancing current products or scoping new features, the Senior Product Manager will be at the heart of our product development process. This is a unique opportunity to work with a customer-centricproduct and drive innovation in our Claim Helper team, developing two key aspects of the product:
  
the customer sign-up process – including helping users sign up for Insurello’s services and handling follow-up questions to ensure the smoothest and most supportive experience, and
  
the CRM system that underpins this process, where the Operations team manages and executes claims efficiently.
  
  

Balancing and optimizing these interconnected components will be an exciting challenge.
  
**Your weekly work would include:** Guiding an empowered product team to drive product development forward, ensuring a shared understanding of priorities and business context.
  
Owning, managing, and prioritizing the product backlog, always guided by a clear product vision.
  
Building strong relationships with customers and internal stakeholders to deeply understand user needs and business objectives, enabling informed, data-driven decisions.
  
Identifying opportunities, defining goals, and measuring success using KPIs and OKRs.
  
Leading product discovery processes and ensuring the team remains aligned on mission and strategy.
  
Who You Are
  
We’re looking for someone who combines strategic vision with a collaborative and people-oriented approach. We believe you will thrive in this role, if you:
  
Have 5+ years of experience as a Product Manager/Product Owner working with customer-centric digital products.
  
Excel in leading empowered, cross-functional teams.
  
Are skilled at stakeholder management, collaboration, and facilitating alignment.
  
Understand how to define and track product goals through OKRs, KPIs, and strategic roadmaps.
  
Are experienced in product discovery processes and prioritizing based on user needs.
  
Are mindful of UX and keep user needs (and truly able to understand them) close to the heart.
  
Believe a data-driven approach and analytical mindset to be your core strengths.
  
Are fluent in Swedish – Insurello is an English-first workplace, but Swedish is used for product development.
  
**It’s extra amazing if you:** Have experience working in a start-up environment, especially in FinTech or InsurTech.
  
Have successfully implemented AI-based projects or initiatives in product development, using innovative solutions to enhance user experiences or streamline processes.
  
Can create a collaborative team environment and feel comfortable challenging the team in a positive way to keep moving forward.
  
What We Offer
  
At Insurello, we’re more than a workplace – we’re a community on a mission to make a meaningful difference. In this role, you’ll have the chance to:
  
Collaborate with diverse team of professionals on creating a difference in people’s lives.
  
Engage deeply in strategic initiatives and work closely with leadership to shape the company’s future.
  
Tackle exciting product challenges and drive innovation.
  
Our benefits include
  
30 days of paid annual vacation
  
Occupational pension plan in Avanza
  
5,000 SEK wellness benefit
  
Flexible hybrid work opportunities with the team based in Stockholm
  
Personal therapy sessions
  
Parental pay top-up
  
Our Culture
  
  

**At Insurello, we live by our values:**  

We care for people – fostering inclusion, empathy, and support.
  
We innovate for impact – delivering meaningful results for our customers.
  
We nurture trust – valuing transparency and collaboration in all we do.
  
If you’re an empathetic, collaborative team player with the energy to drive meaningful change, we’d love to hear from you. Let’s transform the insurance industry together!

title: Senior UX/UI-designer
description:
Offerta och IPIS har blivit Tom, Sveriges största tjänsteförmedling för bygg, flytt och städ. I vår portfölj av varumärken skapar vi transparens och tar bort hinder från bokningsprocessen - vi gör det helt enkelt lättare att hitta pålitliga hantverkare.
  
Nu söker vi dig somkan axla ett helhetsansvar för vårt designarbete. Vi söker någon med gedigen erfarenhet av hela designprocessen, från grafisk design, till hypotesarbete och pixel perfect UIs. Du kommer att ingå i en kombinerad tech- och produktorganisation med fantastiska kollegor.
  
  

**Om rollen:**  

Du driver, dokumenterar och utvecklar designprocessen för att tillsammans med ditt team bygga användarvänliga produkter och flöden.
  
Du tar ett helhetsgrepp från koncept, till research, färdig design och uppföljning.
  
Du tar ansvar för och håller ihop ett plattformsöverskridande designsystem med komponenter och användarflöden.
  
Du tar tillsammans med PM ansvar för att sprida förståelse för våra kunder och deras behov till resten av teamet.
  
Du leder arbetet med, och är ambassadör för designprocessen inom ditt tvärfunktionella team och resten av organisationen.
  
  

**Vad vi söker:**  

En prestigelös lagspelare som hugger i där det krävs och van att jobba nära och kommunicera med PMs, utvecklare, marknad och sälj.
  
Akademisk examen inom ex. design, HCI eller likvärdig arbetslivserfarenhet.
  
Bred erfarenhet av UX/UI design från produktbolag och en portfolio som visar på förmåga att designa användarvänliga lösningar.
  
Erfarenhet av att arbeta i Figma.
  
  

**Bonus om du har:**  

Grundläggande förståelse för front-end-utveckling.
  
Erfarenhet av komponentbaserade designsystem.
  
Erfarenhet av att jobba i Google Analytics.
  
  

För att trivas hos oss tror vi att du är hjälpsam, pragmatisk och värdesätter farten hos ett entreprenöriellt bolag. Hos Tom vill vi skapa en kultur där våra användare är i centrum - vi värdesätter transparens, kontinuerligt lärande och att få saker gjorda.
  
Vi arbetar främst på kontoret, både i Uppsala och Stockholm. Tjänsten utgår från Stockholmskontoret - vilket snart flyttas till nya lokaler precis ovanpå centralstationen.
  
Låter detta intressant?Ansök till tjänsten hos oss idag!
  
  

Vilka är vi på TOM?
  
  

Kanske har du redan stött på oss utan att veta om det. TOM är ett nytt koncept, lanserat i oktober 2024, men bakom namnet finns några av Sveriges mest välkända varumärken inom förmedling och installationstjänster.
  
TOM är den osynliga kraften som ser till att de som behöver hjälp snabbt och smidigt hittar rätt person för jobbet. Som anställd på TOM blir du en viktig del av detta – du bidrar till att koppla ihop människor med pålitliga experter och skapar en positiv upplevelse för alla inblandade. Här får du möjligheten att göra skillnad genom att vara länken mellan behov och lösning, och samtidigt vara med och bygga ett företag som strävar efter att förenkla vardagen för både kunder och yrkespersoner.
  
**Bra att veta Tillträde:** Snarast eller enligt överenskommelse Arbetstid: HeltidArbetsort: Stockholm, arbete på Uppsalakontoret kan förekommaSista ansökningsdatum: Urval och intervjuer sker löpande.
  
För frågor om tjänsten kontakta Josefine, Josefine.johansson@tom.se.
  
Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: UX/UI Designer
description:
**UX/UI Designer** 




**Location:** 
 Taby, Stockholm
 



**Salary:** 
 Up to 55,000 SEK per month
 



**Experience:** 
 5+ years
 



  





**About Our Client:** 
 Our client is a dynamic and innovative company working on cutting-edge technology in the AI and video production space. They are currently seeking a talented
 **UX/UI Designer** 
 to join their team. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the design of an
 **AI producer platform** 
 , working closely with Microsoft Teams design and focusing on accessibility. The ideal candidate will have strong UX/UI design experience, a keen eye for detail, and a passion for creating user-friendly, inclusive experiences.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:**

 Work on designing user interfaces for the AI producer platform, ensuring an intuitive, functional, and aesthetically pleasing experience.
* **Microsoft Teams Integration:** 
 Design and improve integration with Microsoft Teams, optimizing the user experience across the platform.
* **Accessibility:**

* **User Research & Cases:** 
 Collaborate with stakeholders to gather insights on user cases and perform user research to refine and validate design decisions.
* **User Stories & Personas:** 
 Define and develop

 ,
 **personas** 
 , and usability requirements to guide the design process.

 **Figma** 
 ,
 **Fluent** 
 , and
 **Fluent 2** 
 (Fluent 2 experience is a bonus), alongside
 **CSS** 
 and

 for front-end design work.
* **Project Management:** 
 Use
 **Jira** 
 to track tasks, manage priorities, and ensure smooth project flow.
* **Problem Solving:** 
 Be ready to troubleshoot and adapt designs quickly in a fast-paced, live production environment.



  





**Skills & Requirements:** 



* **5-10 years** 
 of experience in UX/UI design with a portfolio demonstrating expertise in design systems, accessibility, and user-centered design.
* Proficiency in
 **Figma** 
 , (
 **Fluent** 
 , and
 **Fluent 2** 
 have both been mentioned, with Fluent 2 experience being a huge plus)
* Experience with
 **accessibility** 
 design, ensuring platforms are usable by a diverse audience (e.g., high contrasts, keyboard navigation).

title: User Experience Designer
description:
**UX / UI Designer | Figma | Fluent | Design | AI | SaaS | Stockholm** 




  





 Join a forward-thinking company at the forefront of AI and video production technology. Our client is seeking a skilled UX/UI Designer to contribute to the development of their innovative AI producer platform. In this role, you’ll collaborate with Microsoft Teams design and prioritize accessibility, making a meaningful impact on user experience.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* **Design & User Experience:** 
 Create intuitive and visually appealing interfaces for the AI producer platform, focusing on functionality and user satisfaction.
* **Microsoft Teams Integration:** 
 Enhance the platform’s integration with Microsoft Teams to optimize user workflows.
* **Accessibility:** 
 Ensure inclusive design by incorporating high contrast, keyboard navigation, and other accessibility standards.
* **User Insights:** 
 Conduct user research and analyze user cases to inform and refine design decisions.
* **Personas & Stories:** 
 Develop user stories and personas to guide design processes and ensure user-centric outcomes.
* **Collaboration with Developers:** 
 Work closely with developers to deliver practical, implementable designs.
* **Design Tools:** 
 Leverage tools like Figma, Fluent, and Fluent 2 (experience with Fluent 2 is a bonus), as well as CSS and JavaScript for front-end work.
* **Project Coordination:** 
 Use Jira to manage tasks and maintain project timelines.
* **Problem Solving:** 
 Adapt and troubleshoot designs quickly in fast-paced, live production settings.



  





**Required Skills & Experience** 



* 5–10 years of UX/UI design experience with a strong portfolio showcasing expertise in design systems, accessibility, and user-focused design.
* Proficiency in
 **Figma** 
 ; experience with Fluent and Fluent 2 is a significant advantage.
* Demonstrated knowledge of accessibility standards, including high contrast and keyboard navigation.
* Expertise in user research, personas, and usability requirements.
* Familiarity with CSS and JavaScript for front-end design.
* Competence in using
 **Jira** 
 for task management.
* Previous experience in video processing, broadcasting, or streaming is a plus.
* Fluency in English; knowledge of Swedish is advantageous.
* Availability to work on-site in Täby, Stockholm, 1–2 days per week.



  





**Ideal Candidate Attributes** 



* Hard-working, driven, and enthusiastic about design.
* A collaborative team player with strong communication skills.
* Adaptable under pressure, especially in live production scenarios.
* Flexible to work occasional overtime when needed.



  





**Additional Information** 



* This position replaces an offshore team, offering an exciting opportunity to shape the platform in a startup-like environment.
* Candidates requiring VISAs will be considered, though Swedish citizens will receive priority.



  





 If you’re a passionate UX/UI Designer looking to influence an innovative AI platform, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now to become a key contributor to this dynamic team!

title: Junior Strategist
description:
**Job Description:**
**iProspect söker Junior Strategist**
 Vill du påbörja din karriär som rådgivare och strateg inom kommunikation och digital marknadsföring? Vi söker nu en Junior Strategist till en av Sveriges ledande byråer.
   

  

 Hos oss på iProspect får du jobba tätt med erfarna strateger, arbeta med kunder som är ledande inom sina branscher och utvecklas genom ett brett strategi-community på dentsu med talanger inom Creative, Media, Customer Experience, Data Science och analys.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som Junior Strategist på iProspect arbetar du med att stödja ledande lokala och globala varumärken i deras tuffaste kommunikationsutmaningar. Du är en del av kundteam med en bredd av specialistkompetenser och har en direkt påverkan på hur Sveriges största varumärken arbetar med marknadsföring och kommunikation.
   

  

 Vi hjälper våra kunder att navigera den digitala ekonomins alltmer komplexa marknad och medielandskap, och du kommer att förse team och kunder med kärnfulla insikter som leder till skarpa lösningar och skapar direkt affärsvärde.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifter inkluderar att stötta seniora kollegor i:
   

  

* Kvalitativ och kvantitativ research och analys av medie- och konsumentbeteenden samt marknad- och kategoriförhållanden. Leverera analyser som genererar värdefulla insikter.
* Identifiera kunders möjligheter och utmaningar på sin marknad
* Formulera och implementera strategier som låser upp tillväxt och skapar affärsnytta


**Vi söker**
 Vi söker dig som vill påbörja din karriär som rådgivare och strateg inom kommunikation och digital marknadsföring. Du är:
   

  

* En nyfiken och analytiskt lagd lagspelare med ett intresse för varumärken och kommunikation
* Nyfiken på den digitala ekonomin och de nya utmaningar och möjligheter företag står inför
* Har förmågan att fokusera på det som på riktigt är intressant och användbart – att hitta insiktsnålar i data-höstackar
* Viljan att utveckla din förmåga att nå fram till och övertyga beslutsfattare med dina insikter och strategier
* Har universitetsexamen inom marknadsföring, ekonomi eller motsvarande. Kanske har du jobbat något år, kanske inte.


**Vi erbjuder en unik utvecklingsmiljö**
 Hos iProspect har du tillgång till branschens vassaste kollegor, branschledande kunder och ett internationellt nätverk.
   

  

 Vad du kan förvänta dig:
   

  

* Samarbete: Arbeta nära våra specialister inom data och research, media och analys.
* Verktyg: Tillgång till verktyg som WARC, Orvesto, Euromonitor, Foresight Factory med flera.
* Community: Bli en del av vår breda strategi-community med strateger inom kreativa områden, data science, CX/UX, webbanalys med mera.
* Nätverk: Utnyttja vårt internationella nätverk, få inspiration och vidareutbildning.
* Kundteam: Arbeta tillsammans med Sveriges bästa kundteam och en oslagbar samling av Sveriges största annonsörer.


**Om iProspect & Dentsu**
 iProspect ingår i Dentsu Sweden som är del i ett globalt kommunikationsnätverk med 72.000 medarbetare i fler än 145 länder. Vi erbjuder våra medarbetare möjligheten att jobba med flera marknadsledande varumärken och spännande kunder. Våra samtliga svenska bolag är miljödiplomerade enligt Svensk Miljöbas och vi jobbar aktivt med vårt sociala och miljömässiga ansvarstagande som arbetsgivare och medmänniskor. Diversity, Equity & Inclusion är djupt förankrat i våra gemensamma värderingar - the 8 Ways to Never Before – och vårt Leadership Framework är applicerbart på alla våra medarbetare. Vi är stolta över det som gör oss unika som företag och individer och vi uppmuntrar sökande från alla olika typer av bakgrunder att söka sig till oss.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder bland annat:
   

  

* Kollektivavtal
* 5000 kr i friskvårdsbidrag
* 30 dagars semesterrätt
* Flexibilitet och den bästa möjliga mixen av två goda ting, att jobba på våra kontor och att jobba hemma
* Många karriär- och utvecklingsmöjligheter


**Ansökan och kontakt**
 Låter det här som något för dig? Om du kan se dig själv i rollen som Junior strateg på iProspect och som en del av dentsu-nätverket, vänta inte med att skicka in din ansökan.
   

  

 Vid frågor, kontakta:
   

  

 Maria K., Cederbrand, Senior Talent Acquisition Partner
   

  

 maria.cederbrand@dentsu.com.
   

  

**Location:**
 Stockholm
   

  

**Brand:**
 Iprospect
   

  

**Time Type:**
 Full time
   

  

**Contract Type:**
 Permanent

title: Kravanalytiker UX-designer
description:
Arbetsbeskrivning
   

  

 Vi står inför en spännande och händelserik tid med mycket nyutveckling. Som kravanalytiker/UX-designer hos oss kommer du ingå i ett tvärfunktionellt SCRUM team som tillsammans utvecklar och förvaltar Polismyndighetens alla e-tjänster. Vi arbetar enligt agila principer där vi hjälps åt att leverera tillgängliga, högkvalitativa lösningar. Det innebär att du kommer få hjälpa till med varierande uppgifter som behövs för att lyckas med våra leveranser.
   

  

 För att förstå och verifiera användarnas behov kommer du bland annat att hålla i workshops, designsprintar, genomföra intervjuer samt ta fram och testa prototyper. Du är med från ide till release och kommer även att samordna och strukturera arbetet kring de olika utvecklingsuppdragen du arbetar med. Resultatet dokumenterar du i kravspecifikationer, user stories, prototyper mm. Rollen innebär också ett nära samarbete med systemutvecklarna för att få till bra e-tjänster. Stort fokus ligger på att kommunicera med olika intressenter, både internt inom Polisen och externt med våra olika målgrupper. Resor inom Sverige förekommer i tjänsten.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer
   

  

 Vi söker dig som:
   

  

* har relevant akademisk examen/yrkesutbildning eller motsvarande erfarenhet som Polismyndigheten bedömer som likvärdig.
* minst 4 års erfarenhet av att arbeta som kravanalytiker/ UX-designer.
* är van att planera och genomföra användarcentrerad behovsinsamling och sedan dokumentera detta som user stories och kravspecifikationer till bland annat utvecklare.
* har erfarenhet av relevanta metoder för arbete inom UX-design, däribland användartest, intervjuer och att skapa prototyper.
* har erfarenhet av att samarbeta och kommunicera med olika intressenter, via t.ex. workshops, för att hitta lösningar på gemensamma mål.
* talar och skriver svenska obehindrat.


 Tjänsten kräver svenskt medborgarskap
   

  

 Det är meriterande om du har:
   

  

* kunskap om WCAG och tillgänglighet i digitala produkter.
* arbetat som webb- eller systemutvecklare.
* arbetat systematiskt med testning.
* erfarenhet av att arbeta enligt ett agilt arbetssätt.
* erfarenhet av prototypverktyg, exempelvis Axure, Figma och/eller erfarenhet av att skriva Microcopy.


**Personliga egenskaper**
 Du behöver ha en analytisk förmåga, vara ansvarstagande och ha ett starkt driv. Du vill hela tiden arbeta för att vi tillsammans kontinuerligt levererar så bra lösningar som möjligt. Du är en lagspelare som har lätt för att samarbeta och är kommunikativ och kan hantera många kontaktytor. Arbetsuppgifterna ställer krav på att du har en god förmåga att bryta ner komplexa uppgifter.
   

  

 Vi kommer att lägga stor vikt vid din personliga lämplighet.
   

  

 Kontaktpersoner
   

  

 Har du frågor om uppdraget är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef: 010 -5637410
   

  

 Har du frågor om rekryteringsprocessen är du välkommen att kontakta ansvarig HR-konsult: isabel.akermark@polisen.se
   

  

 Fackliga företrädare
   

  

 Polisförbundet, Sofia Ask, tfn: 010-563 87 10
   

  

 SACO, nås via mejl saco-s.avdelningarna@polisen.se
   

  

 SEKO Polisen, Karna Tillheden, tfn: 010-561 66 27
   

  

 ST, Tom Johnsson 076-947 00 30
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning
   

  

 Arbetsort: Stockholm
   

  

 Arbetstid: Flextid
   

  

 Tillträde: Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Funktion: Kravanalytiker/UX-designer, IT-avdelningen, E-tjänster
   

  

**Ansök genom att bifoga ditt CV (vi vill inte ha något personligt brev) och besvara urvalsfrågorna på svenska** 
 . Frågorna utgår från kravprofilen för den här rekryteringen och dina svar ligger till grund för det urval som sker i processen.
 **Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.** 
 Vänligen notera att krav och eventuella meriter ska vara uppfyllda vid ansökningstillfället.
   

  

 De uppgifter du lämnar i samband med din ansökan kan användas för att kontakta dig, få information och kallelser samt eventuella anställningshandlingar.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan i form av CV och bifogad enkät (pdf, 278 kB) via e-post till jobb.na@polisen.se senast den
 **18 december 2024.** 
 Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via den mailadress som anges i annonsen.
 **Märk din ansökan med referensnummer A726.765/2024 i mailets ärendemening.**
 Har du skyddade personuppgifter, referenser eller liknande information som du själv bedömer som skyddsvärd rekommenderar vi att du kontaktar ansvarig HR-konsult innan du går vidare med din ansökan.
   

  

 En anställning hos Polismyndigheten kan komma att inledas med en provanställning om sex månader.
   

  

 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) genomförs innan beslut om anställning fattas. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. Läs mer om krigsplacering och säkerhetsprövning under https://polisen.se/krigsplacering och https://polisen.se/sakerhetsprovning
   

  

 Polismyndigheten kommer att behandla dina personuppgifter i enlighet med reglerna i EU:s dataskyddsförordning (2016/679) och annan tillämplig dataskyddsreglering. Läs mer om vår hantering av personuppgifter på https://polisen.se/personuppgifter/rekrytering
   

  

 Din ansökan är en allmän handling enligt offentlighetsprincipen.
   

  

**Polismyndigheten**
 Polismyndigheten erbjuder dig en arbetsplats som stimulerar till mångfald, kreativitet och personlig utveckling. Läs gärna om våra förmåner som anställd hos polisen på https://polisen.se/erbjudande
   

  

 Vi bedriver vår verksamhet enligt vår värdegrund: engagemang, effektivitet och tillgänglighet. Som medarbetare inom polisen agerar du för likabehandling. Det är en förutsättning för rättssäkerhet, rättstrygghet och för polisens legitimitet i samhället. Som företrädare för polisen respekterar du allas lika värde och skapar förtroende för polisen.
   

  

 Läs gärna mer om polisen och vår verksamhet på www.polisen.se
   

 www.polisen.se
   

  

**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!**
 Vi undanber oss samtal och mail från dig som vill sälja annons- och rekryteringstjänster.
   

  

 Sök jobbet
   

  

 Ansök via e-post

title: Senior Product Designer
description:
*We are Tibber, the energy company that wants you to use less energy. Whaaat? That’s right. We’ll get back to that. Yes, we are by definition an energy company, but we’re more techy than most. How and why you might ask. Well, a third of our employees are actually working on developing products and solutions that can help you use energy in a smarter way and at a lower cost – all with the help of cool fancy tech. Good for our customers, their wallets, and the planet.*
*Our growth rate has been truly amazing, and still, we’re just getting started. With millions of smart devices connected to the Tibber platform (like electric vehicles and smart thermostats), we have one of the most unique portfolios trading energy on the market* 
 .
   

  

**🚀🚀Job Mission**
 Join Tibber at an exciting time of growth and opportunity! As a Senior Product Designer, you’ll take on a wide range of design challenges throughout the product lifecycle, collaborating closely with engineering, product, product specialists, and fellow product designers.
   

  

**Some Of Your Key Responsibilities Will Include**
**Design system expertise.** 
 You’ll play a vital role in driving, contributing to, building, maintaining, and evolving our design systems. You’ll engage stakeholders and advocate for consistency through the design system.
   

  

**User advocacy.** 
 You’ll champion the user perspective in design discussions, ensuring usability and accessibility standards are met across all products and platforms.
   

  

**Collaboration.** 
 Working within a cross-functional team, you’ll research, wireframe, design, and test to deliver high-quality solutions for your team’s domain.
   

  

**User research.** 
 You’ll identify when user research is needed and, in collaboration with user researchers, plan, conduct, and synthesize research and usability test findings.
   

  

**Two-way feedback culture.** 
 You’ll regularly share your designs and seek feedback, approaching and resolving design critiques constructively and gracefully.
   

  

**UI Design.** 
 You’ll engage in hands-on crafting of implementation-ready designs, focusing on details such as interaction and UI design choices.
   

  

**⚡⚡️Ideal Profile**
**UX Design expertise.** 
 You have 5+ years of experience in UX design, with a strong portfolio showcasing your design process, including wireframes, prototypes, and final designs.
   

  

**Solid understanding of product development principles.** 
 You’re familiar with principles such as viability, desirability, and feasibility, as well as interaction design principles like consistency, affordance, learnability, predictability, and feedback, and how these integrate into the design process.
   

  

**User research skills.** 
 You bring strong experience with user research methods, including interviews, surveys, usability testing, and data analysis.
   

  

**Engineering collaborator.** 
 You excel in partnering with engineers to implement designs and work as a cohesive team.
   

  

**User problem-solving expertise.** 
 You invest time in understanding core user problems, recognizing that defining the “what” is essential to designing the “how.”
   

  

**Excellent communication.** 
 You effectively articulate design decisions with your team and stakeholders, advocating for the user while fostering collaboration.
   

  

**Team player.** 
 You value teamwork and enjoy the process of co-creating solutions with your team.
   

  

**Technical proficiency.** 
 You’re highly skilled in Figma, particularly in working with components and variants in a design system.
   

  

**Agility in work.** 
 You’re experienced in running cross-functional workshops, design sprints, and collaborative exercises.
   

  

**Leadership mindset.** 
 Experience mentoring or guiding other designers is a plus. You consistently raise the bar, taking ownership of the quality of your work while driving quality across the team.
   

  

**🦹🏽‍♀️👨‍🎤Get Ready For**
**Innovation.** 
 A way to change the landscape of one of the most important industries on the planet.
   

  

**Growth.** 
 A possibility to learn a lot and push the barriers of what you think is possible, with the possibility to grow personally and professionally.
   

  

**Autonomy.** 
 An autonomous and humble culture in a scale-up adventure.
   

  

**Empowerment.** 
 Your voice matters, we are a place to work where laughter and support amongst diverse and inclusive colleagues are guaranteed.
   

  

**Flexible benefits.** 
 Whether this is towards, health, wellness, equipment, or other allowances important to you, we will do our best to accommodate your needs.
   

  

**💆🏻‍♀️💆🏽‍♂️The Tibber Mindset**
 Being on a mission to change an industry as we do fundamentally also means being prepared for the unexpected. Tibber is a startup in the word's true sense, which means we are on a journey of constant change. We do what others say can’t be done, try and fail together but never lose sight of our users.
   

  

 We work passionately with sustainability and a circular approach, both with our own products and in the entire ecosystem that is affected by everything we do.
   

  

 We're very proud of being a mission-driven startup with thousands and thousands of new users every month. Starting out with two passionate founders in 2016, we're now 300+ people working for Tibber in our offices in Stockholm, Førde, Berlin, Amsterdam, Oslo, and Helsinki, and with that number growing each week, we’re still just getting started. Throughout 2025 we will continue to grow in our current markets, and we are thrilled to be backed by investors like Balderton Capital, Eight Roads Ventures, Founders Fund, Summa, and Schibsted.
   

  

*At Tibber, we are committed to hiring, developing, and retaining exceptional people regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, neurodiversity, or gender identity. We strongly encourage people from underrepresented groups to apply.*
 Tibber is a different company in a very traditional industry. We are aiming to create the best digital tool so that you as a user can apply new technologies to reduce energy consumption and power costs.

title: Social Media Specialist
description:
**About Making Science** 




  





 Making Science is an international digital acceleration company with over 1,200 experts across 15 markets, including Spain, Portugal, Mexico, Colombia, France, Italy, the UK, Ireland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Finland, Germany, Georgia, and the USA. As a proud consulting partner of Local Planet — the world’s premier network of independent media agencies — we deliver a suite of digital, technology, and performance marketing services to a global clientele. Our expertise spans digital marketing and MarTech, software and cloud solutions, artificial intelligence, and SaaS, all underscored by a relentless pursuit of innovation.
 



  





 Making Science was ranked 15th in the FT1000: Europe's Fastest-Growing Companies 2023. Committed to making a positive impact, Making Science actively engages in various ESG initiatives. We’ve joined forces with the Climate Pledge, the United Nations Global Compact, and Pledge1%, dedicating resources and efforts to support non-profit organizations. Through these endeavors, we are committed to driving meaningful change for a brighter, more sustainable future.
 



  





 As part of its commitment to innovation, Making Science offers its clients end-to-end capabilities required for consulting, development, integration, and maintenance of advanced IT solutions. Our global network of delivery hubs not only fosters job growth but also serves as an incubator for cultivating top-tier tech talent, fueling projects that accelerate transformation and modernisation.
 



  





 Our team is composed of digital native professionals, who have a wide knowledge in the different stages and disciplines of the digital transformation: Digital Strategy, Infrastructures, Software Development, Creativity and UX/UI Design, Digital Marketing, and Big Data.
 



  





 Making Science is People Centric, and we actively bet on our employees! We believe that they are the key to any successful business, and therefore, our greatest asset. We strive to provide daily learning opportunities for those who work with us and their colleagues. It is also really important that they enjoy what they do, and have positive experiences. We want our employees to feel proud of their accomplishments, and that they belong to a company that is in constant growth, because each person’s contribution is essential to achieve our success. Do you want to be part of this great family?
 



  





**📝Some details about your department** 




  





 At Social Media, we focus mainly on building a brand's voice through content and interaction on different social channels. We look for profiles that are sharp, and that have the capability to think critically and adapt quickly to projects that are really diverse: from the creation of content strategies on a brand's different channels to the development of interaction and social listening dynamics.
 



 In this department, analytical capabilities are as important as creativity. Our projects always start by analyzing the audience, the market, and the competition to gain a deep understanding of the media and digital channels. Our proposals stand out strategically, and rely on measurable data.
 



 Our objective is to always offer our clients effectiveness in their messages, and work with them to build a credible brand in a competitive environment.
 



  





**🎯 What we’d like you to do** 




  





 Strategically plan, manage and optimize account structure and campaigns in all social channels and platforms
 



 Make sure that all client updates are done in a timely and accurate manner
 



 Deliver reports based on the analysis of campaign data (DataStudio, Excel)
 



 Coordinate internally across different departments
 



 Design and execute client’s media plan
 



 Contribute to client business growth by identifying new opportunities and communicating creative solutions to planning teams
 



 Create and present client-facing material to support media planning cycles
 



  





**🔊 What we’d like you to bring** 




  





 At least 1-2 year of experience in a similar role working with performance campaings.
 



 Great knowledge on various social media plattforms (Meta, TikTok, LinkedIn, etc.)
 



 Experience from working with performance focused clients in social, such as e-commerce clients
 



 Good understanding of how to implement tracking and events on Meta and Tiktok
 



 Certifications in Meta (planning and/or buying) – not required but would be great.
 



 You have an advanced level of English.
 



 You are highly familiar with Google Analytics.
 



  





 ✔️
 **Perks of joining us** 




  





 Our office is centrally located in the middle of the city in Stockholm.
 



 We offer a fixed salary according to your worth and experience.
 



 With us you will get Health care allowance and service pension via our partner Max Matthiessen.
 



 Do you know someone that fits in Making Science? Refer him or her, and you can get a bonus if they’re hired!
 



 Feedback is part of our day to day lives. We recognize a job well done through a continuous feedback model.
 



 You will always have the opportunity to be involved and influence your daily work.
 



 The opportunity to meet our international team with our Ambassadors Program.
 



 We care about a healthy work-life balance. You can count on having flexible working hours and the possibility of hybrid work.
 



 You will never stop learning with us: subsidized training, free language classes, learning capsules, an e-learning platform, and manymore.
 



 We know how to have a good time!
 



 We have a joint Friday breakfast together every week.
 



 Take a break in our lounge area, play foosball, pool, or PlayStation.
 



 Be a part of a young, adventurous, and professional team, with people you’ll grow fond of!

title: Business Expert - Successfactors - Digital People Lifecycle
description:
**Company Description**
 H&M is one of the biggest fashion companies in the world. We are a family of brands, driven by our mission to make a sustainable lifestyle an option for the many. With our customers at heart, we offer fashion, design, and services to millions of customers every day.
   

  

 We believe that it’s when you mix and match different talents, experiences, and styles that the real magic happens. That’s why our teams are built with different personalities, talents and people from all kinds of backgrounds. If you are willing to learn, grow and help our customers and your colleagues, H&M will always be a place for you to both express your individuality and feel like you belong. Be yourself & more at H&M.
   

  

 We are on a journey to create the best people organization in the industry. Digital People Life Cycle team as a part of our Central People Organization with the objective to deliver the most impactful, holistic and customer centric colleague journey. Digital People Life Cycle is home for a diverse group of digital HR professionals, who work together towards our common people strategy and vision.
   

  

 As part Digital People Life Cycle, you will play a pivotal role in empowering seamless and impactful colleague experiences by aligning digital HR strategies with our core values and technology. You will be part of the HXM team that develop and implement solutions on the Successfactors HRIS connected to the surrounding tech eco system. The team mission is to optimize HR processes through automation and self-service, and ensuring a relevant and intuitive experience for employees throughout the colleague lifecycle.
   

  

**Job Description**
* Analyze the business requirements and create updated process and requirements documentation
* Part of problem management team
* Lead, create supporting documentation and plan testing and other quality assurance activities
* Creating and conducting training of SF functionality and processes
* Support the global super user and country super user network
* Responsible for the communication to stakeholders and users about new features/initiatives.
* Work with the product back-log
* Contribute with Successfactors EC expertise in various forums for project and maintenance.
* You will work to achieve progress and secure the content in the process and the solution. All with the aim to maximize business impact, benefits, and effects to reach our targets
* You will be a project leader and drive/coordinate cross functional process changes & solution deliverables


**Qualifications**
* Expert in Successfactors Employee Central (Admin certification is merit) and other modules connected to the people administration perspective (Onboarding 2.0, Document management).
* Detailed knowledge on SuccessFactors best practice implementation and UI and UX elements (Home page, people profile and workflow)
* Experience of other SuccessFactors concepts and modules for performance and talent management
* Good knowledge on integrations, RBP and access management
* Strong stakeholder management and communication skills.
* Ability to take responsibility and work proactively in a complex, continuously changing environment.
* Experience in Jira, ServiceNow, TeamShift & Miro
* Independent and self-driven takes responsibility and accountability in reaching our deliverables across the function.
* Have a business and customer-oriented mindset with the motivation to constantly improve, achieve targets and drive agenda forward.


**Additional Information**
 H&M is a workplace where you’ll join a global fashion family that combines teamwork with individual expression and gives you the challenges and opportunities that can help you learn, grow and succeed.
   

  

 We believe that it’s when you mix and match different talents, experiences, and styles that the real magic happens. That’s why our teams are built with different personalities, talents and people from all kinds of backgrounds. If you are willing to learn, grow and help our customers and your colleagues, H&M will always be a place for you to both express your individuality and feel like you belong.
   

  

 We also believe that you can’t change the world without great people on your side. So, we offer all our employee's generous benefits, lots of learning opportunities and the possibility to start building a more long-term career. Bring your whole personality to work, stay as long as you want, and grow more than you ever thought was possible. Be yourself & more at H&M.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!

title: Technical Watermark Designer
description:
**Crane Currency has an immediate position opening for a Technical Watermark Deisgner , Based out of TUMBA.**
**Who We Are**
 Crane Currency is a premier industrial technology company and a pioneer in currency manufacturing and advanced micro-optics technology for securing physical products. Yes, chances are you have our product in your wallet right now! Our sophisticated equipment and software leverages proprietary core capabilities with detection and sensing technologies. Around the world, our customers trust us to anticipate their needs with innovative, reliable, and high-quality currency & authentication solutions and services—just as they have for generations.
   

  

**How You Will Make An Impact**
 This role provides you an opportunity where millions of people one day may be holding your design work. Our customers look to you and the global design team to bring their dreams into reality. You will be involved with projects to design our customers’ currency and security products. You will partner with internal stakeholders to help expand our brand awareness and employer proposition. Your work will be captured globally on both Currency and Consumer brands.
   

  

 As a Technical Watermark Designer At Crane You Will
   

  

* Create designs for customers from procurement that become technical specification and contribute to new customers and markets for Crane Currency.
* Understand the market and customer demand to meet both design and technical design.
* Design standard watermark for customer s based on substrate or demand.
* Design drawings (sheet layouts) with associated substrates for paper production and sheeting.
* Ensure that all production documentation from specified documentation from design is available at the start of production.
* Produce technical documentation for the tablecloth production according to plan and be responsible for ensuring that the documentation meets the customer's demand regarding aesthetics, safety, production and quality requirements.
* Ensure that digital documentation meets the customer's expectations after production .
* Responsible for developing the design of Window Wire .


**Required**
**Knowledge and expertise that matter most for this role:**
* Education: Te chnical Univeristy Degree alt ernatively College engineering with several years of documented experience from Design and Manufacturing.
* Language :  Go od k nowledge of Swedish and En g lish ( verbally and written )
* IT :   Go od knowledge of the Microsoft Office package , Gra phic Software s uch as Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator and Corel Draw.


**Preferred :**
* E xperience from LE AN and working with Continuous Improvement.


**H Ow We Will Care For You**
* Top- notch medical benefits – We take care of you with our wellness allowance and reimbursement for medicines and medical care .
* Personal development – We want you to grow with us . Through lunch & learns , career ladders and more .
* Community Engagement – Give yourself time to support the local community and environment through volunteer events and on-site initiatives to benefit local communities and organizations .
* There’s more – Competitive compensation , vacation , parental leave , and retirement plans.


**What Drives Our Team**
 We are a passionate team of 1,200 creators and problem solvers, united by our purpose, we give people confidence every day in moments that matter. This comes to life through our Shared Values:
   

  

* People Matter
* Do the Right Thing
* Trusted Partner
* Innovate for Growth
* Always Improving


 Pe ople are at the center of all that we do, from our employees to our customers and our communities. We empower our teams to help shape the Crane Currency experience, embracing and celebrating our unique perspectives and differences to learn from each other and grow stronger together. To learn more about life at Crane Currency, visit .
   

  

**Where We Are**
 Your role is in Tumba, Stockholm , located in the historic Tumba Bruk area, 10 -minute walking distance from the train station, 30 km south of Stockholm, and about 20 minutes from Stockholm Central Station. Tumba is a small suburb in an area with different cultures from all corners of the world. The area offers a beautiful landscape and countryside feeling. You can spend the day to explore the shopping mall nearby, enjoy the surrounding nature, or take the train into the vibrant pulse of Stockholm City to enjoy the many restaurants, shopping, sightseeing and stroll through beautiful Downtown, Gamla Stan.
   

  

 Crane Currency is a drug free workplace.
   

  

 Crane NXT is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, disability, or national origin or any other characteristic protected under applicable local law.
   

  

 #CCY
   

  

 #ONSITE
   

  

 - KP 1
