Experience Level
ENTRY\_LEVEL


Employment Status
FULL\_TIME


Workplace Type
On-site


Description & Requirements
Kickstart Your Career with Infor!
Are you graduating during 2025 and eager to launch your career with a fast-growing and innovative company? Join Infor and become part of a team that collaborates with leading international clients in the Food & Beverage, Distribution, Equipment, and Fashion industries. At Infor, your journey begins with endless opportunities to learn, grow, and make an impact.  

Accelerate Your Professional Development
We are dedicated to nurturing talent and providing a supportive environment where you can thrive. As a member of our M3 Finance application team, you will work in our Linköping office alongside experienced professionals who are committed to guiding you through the early stages of your career. Our Early Talent program ensures you receive personalized mentorship, exposure to cutting-edge technologies, and a deep dive into industry-leading enterprise cloud applications.  

Your Role in Shaping the Future
Join us as a Development Business Analyst, working on the M3 Finance module. Here, you'll be at the forefront of creating solutions that digitalize and optimize business processes for our clients. This role offers a strong foundation for your career, equipping you with the skills and experiences needed to excel in the IT industry.
If you are ready to embark on an exciting career path in a company that values Respect, Humility, and Self-Actualization, keep reading to discover how you can be part of our dynamic team!
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_
Development Business Analyst Role
As a Development Business Analyst working on the M3 Finance module, you will:* Design solutions for new functionalities and enhance existing business processes within the finance domain.
* Engage in the full system development life cycle, from conceptualization to execution, including analysis, testing, and documentation.
* Serve as a functional expert, assisting Infor colleagues with deep insights into the M3 Finance application.
  

What We Value:* A passion for software development and customer success.
* An academic degree in business economics, engineering, systems science, or accounting is highly welcomed.
* Creative problem-solving skills with a focus on detailed solutions.
* Proficiency in Swedish and English.
* Experience with ERP systems, especially M3, is a plus but not mandatory.
  

Your Career Journey with Infor
Starting a career is a thrilling venture, and we are here to support you. You will join our Early Talent program, where you'll collaborate with a mentor to grow into your role. Throughout the first year, you'll connect with team members across development units, learn our tools and products, and immerse yourself in our culture, which is built on Respect, Humility, and Self-Actualization.
If you are eager to contribute to a collaborative and innovative team, we invite you to explore this exciting opportunity with Infor.  


  

About Infor  

Infor is a global leader in business cloud software products for companies in industry specific markets. Infor builds complete industry suites in the cloud and efficiently deploys technology that puts the user experience first, leverages data science, and integrates easily into existing systems. Over 60,000 organizations worldwide rely on Infor to help overcome market disruptions and achieve business-wide digital transformation.
For more information visit www.infor.com  


Our Values  

At Infor, we strive for an environment that is founded on a business philosophy called Principle Based Management™ (PBM™) and eight Guiding Principles: integrity, stewardship & compliance, transformation, principled entrepreneurship, knowledge, humility, respect, self-actualization. Increasing diversity is important to reflect our markets, customers, partners, and communities we serve in now and in the future.  

We have a relentless commitment to a culture based on PBM. Informed by the principles that allow a free and open society to flourish, PBM™ prepares individuals to innovate, improve, and transform while fostering a healthy, growing organization that creates long-term value for its clients and supporters and fulfillment for its employees.  

Infor is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment. Infor does not discriminate against candidates or employees because of their sex, race, gender identity, disability, age, sexual orientation, religion, national origin, veteran status, or any other protected status under the law. If you require accommodation or assistance at any time during the application or selection processes, please submit a request by following the directions located in the FAQ section at the bottom of the infor.com/about/careers webpage.

title: Senior Engineering Manager
description:
We are looking for an experienced leader to join our team as Senior Engineering Manager for our Engineering Experience group. This team plays a critical role in shaping the technical architecture of our systems, building frameworks, CI/CD pipelines, and providing support to other engineering teams.  

**YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:**  

* Lead and manage the Engineering Experience team, overseeing technical architecture, framework development and CI/CD pipelines.
* Define and implement strategies to optimise the engineering workflow, streamline development processes, and improve overall system performance, reliability, and scalability.
* Build and maintain the paved road used by other engineering teams, providing best practices, guidelines, and tools to accelerate development and ensure consistency across projects.
* Manage an SRE (Site Reliability Engineering) team responsible for providing specialised support to other engineering groups, including troubleshooting complex issues, optimising system performance, and implementing best practices in reliability, scalability, and security
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify technical requirements, prioritise initiatives, and drive continuous improvement in engineering practices and standards.

  

**OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING:**  

  

ESSENTIAL SKILLS

* Proven experience in implementing and managing cloud infrastructure solutions
* Strong understanding of cloud computing concepts and technologies (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform)
* Excellent leadership and communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively across teams
* Demonstrated track record of driving innovation and delivering results in a fast-paced environment

**WHO WE ARE**  


At the core of LeoVegas Group is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1800 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 16 offices worldwide.  

  

  

**BENEFITS**  

  

* Hybrid work policy
* 4 weeks of Workation *(**T&C apply)*
* 30 annual vacation days
* Occupational Pension
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually
* Parental Leave Top-Up
* Possibility to enrol in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 1,500 SEK equipment allowance
* Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts
* We offer a relocation package with accommodation and flights.

**JOIN US!**


In our pride, we empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait for things to happen; we pounce and make it happen!


Would you be a good fit for the Leo Pride - give us a roar!


\*\*As our company working language is English, we’d like to see your CV in English, please\*\*

title: Senior Cybersecurity Engineer
description:
Senior Cybersecurity Engineer


Swedium Global is the growing System Engineering and Solution Company, offers services like Semiconductor Engineering R&D Services, Embedded Systems Development, Custom Application Software Development, Web and Cloud Application Development, Testing Services, Consultancy and Outsourcing services to our clients across the globe for an onsite and offshore business model. Swedium Global is having presence in Sweden, Finland, Poland, Czech Republic and in India.


Location: Sweden


Expected Start date: ASAP


Job Description: Senior Cybersecurity Expert


Our client is responsible for the climate development within the company. They own most of the components connected to the climate function and the SW-control of the same.

  


**What will you do?**


Volvo Cars is looking for someone with a background in cybersecurity and system safety engineering to analyse the climate systems and functions, and build/structure the necessary documentation to fulfil regulations.

  


**What are they looking for?**


* M.Sc. within Systems, Control and Mechatronics, SW Engineering, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Physics or equivalent experience.
* Knowledge of Cybersecurity standard like ISO 21434, CSMS etc.
* Knowledge of automotive safety standard like ISO 26262
* Experience with function development
* Proficiency in systems engineering, particularly in the automotive domain.
* Experience with risk assessment, analysis methodologies, and functional safety processes.
* Fluency in spoken and written English
* Perfect communication and collaboration skills

  
Job Overview


* Location : Gothenberg, Sweden
* Vacancy : 1
* Key Skills : ISO 21434, Cybersecurity

title: Senior Sales Executive with industry focus - Tietoevry Tech Services
description:
You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.
Are you a person who likes to work with the latest technology while having experience in management and wants to join one of the largest tech companies in the Nordics? Then this is the role for you!
Strategic Sales Executive have the overall responsibility for successfully selling and negotiating multi-year complex business relationships to senior client executives in our chosen industries. They lead strategic sales engagements from qualification to closure, selling solutions to meet complex IT and business requirements. Engagements are characterized by a complex combination of technical, business, financial and human resource issues related to the strategic and tactical direction of clients and driven by the need for change within the business.
When joining Tietoevry Tech Services as a Strategic Sales Executive* You win new deals!
* You build and manage strategic relationships at client decision bodies (CEO, CFO and Board of Directors level) within agreed industries and targeted accounts.
* You are overall responsible for managing large and complex deals from qualification to wins.
* You analyze Opportunity/RFI/RFP and define a winning sales strategy that fits to client requirements/situation. Gain agreement for deployment of the strategy and manage the engagement plan and associated deliverables
* You effectively lead and motivate entire pursuit teams, a multidisciplinary sales and solution team, by establishing a ‘winning spirit’ in the deal team. Structures and leads contract negotiations with clients.
* You effectively manage internal governance procedures and manage internal stakeholders across the company.


Who we are looking for* You have a proven track record in the successful conclusion of complex, big value-based or large and transformative deals. Has a consistent track record in sales of won cases (X number of 5m+ deals)
* You have business understanding and experience from one or more of the industries Manufacturing, Retail/Consumer or Telecom.
* You have a broad understanding of application and cloud services and has relevant and up to date knowledge of the market and competition.
* You have an extensive CxO and IT stakeholder network in the Swedish market within one or more of our chosen industries.
* You have experience of working within complex matrix organizations and orchestrate the best of the Tietoevry organization.
* You know when to approprietly challenge the various deal domains (solution, finance, legal, HR…) on the overall approach to encourage creative solutions that can be expanded by the teams.
* You have creativity and ability to find workarounds and solutions in complex situations, as opposed to being process-driven


We also believe you have* Long track record in complex sales whereof min 5-10 years as a dealmaker or equivalent.
* Strategic & Consultative selling skills
* Excellent team leadership qualities - Leads by example
* Strong commercial awareness
* Creative thinking and solution management
* Strong and experienced complex deals negotiator
* Experience in operating within formal and informal procurement processes
* Very high standards of written and verbal communication.
* Outstanding presentation skills – both personally and coaching the team (junior and senior actors on the team.
* Tenacious, persistent and determined, learning mindset, tolerance to ambiguity and a drive to win despite challenges


We offer
We offer you professional growth, meaningful projects and an open culture. We believe that our organizational culture is an important part of enabling you to be successful.
We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working. Finally, we also believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle where you need to unlearn and relearn every day as new possibilities emerge.
Did we get you inspired?
We look forward to your application! Please attach your CV or LinkedIn-profile and we will reach out to you. Interviews will be held on a continuous basis, so we encourage you to apply today. If you have any questions regarding this role, please contact the recruiter at martin.westerberg@tietoevry.com
Hope to hear from you soon!
Location: Stockholm or Göteborg*We perform background checks on all final candidates.**Tietoevry declines calls from recruitment companies.*
About Tietoevry
Tietoevry is one of the leading companies in the Nordics building better digital services for our clients both on private and public sectors. With us, you are part of the forefront of emerging businesses and technology making the difference with our customers. Cooperate and exchange ideas with professionals in an international and evolving working environment. Increase your knowledge in a variety of areas, you set the limit. Our culture is built on transparency and active sharing – a truly open environment.
At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity. Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Pre-Sales Engineer (e-Invoicing)
description:
**Build your future with Sovos.**



If you're seeking a career where innovation meets impact, you've come to the right place. As a global leader, Sovos is transforming tax compliance from a business requirement to a force for growth while revolutionising how businesses navigate the ever-changing regulatory landscape.



At Sovos, we're dedicated to more than just solving compliance challenges – we're committed to making a positive and lasting difference in everything we do. Our teams operate on the modern edge of digital technology, working not only to solve complex business challenges but also to enrich our personal, professional, and local communities.



Our purpose-built systems provide the tools you need to thrive in a world where governments demand increased visibility, faster reporting and greater control over business processes. Excited about the possibilities? So are we!



Don’t worry if you don't check all the boxes – apply anyway! We're focused on hiring the right people, not just the "right" resume. It's not about what you've done elsewhere; it's all about what you're capable of doing here.

  


**The Work You'll Do:**



The Pre-Sales Engineer (e-Invoicing) will work with the Direct Sales and Alliance teams to provide technical support during the sales cycle for our relevant solutions within Sovos’ Indirect Tax Technology Suite (ITTS). The Pre-Sales Engineer (e-Invoicing) acts as the bridge between sales and product, professional services & support, utilizing technical expertise to support the sales team and deliver solutions that meet customer needs.



The Pre-Sales Engineer (e-Invoicing) will be adept at leveraging technical expertise to deliver innovative solutions, ensuring a seamless integration of product offerings with client needs. Also, this role possesses strong communication, enabling effective cross-functional collaboration and the successful execution of complex sales initiatives. Known for developing robust sales strategies, conducting impactful product demonstrations, and providing comprehensive technical support to both clients and internal sales teams. The Pre-Sales Engineer (e-Invoicing) will report to the Sales Engineering Manager – Europe.


*More specifically you will:*


* Provide superior domain expertise around ITTS solutions
* Maintain expert level understanding of functionality and technical architecture of our products
* Assist in the client discovery process to help uncover unforeseen challenges and desired solution architecture. Also conduct reviews of discovery questionnaires to ensure customer landscape knowledge is documented and any other sales opportunities are identified
* Develop a firm understanding of customer needs, pain points, and requirements around the ITTS and align Sovos solutions to fulfill the needs and requirements to eliminate the pain
* Work closely with Sovos’ Sales to conduct sales and solutions presentations
* Collaborate with Professional Services and product functions to ensure a successful onboarding post sale
* Maintain and continually improve demonstration capabilities in order to be able to present to customers a compelling and coherent narrative as to the key features and benefits of Sovos solutions
* Conduct in-depth technical presentations and product demonstrations to prospects and clients.
* Act with integrity and demonstrate ethical behavior in all matters with all stakeholders
* Take full responsibility for ensuring internal and external customer satisfaction
* Demonstrate a high degree of self-awareness and commitment to personal development and learning
* Focus on process improvement, adept at optimizing sales workflows and driving efficiency to enhance revenue growth and customer satisfaction.
* Develop and lead training sessions both within and outside the Sales Engineer department
* Serve as a subject matter expert surrounding the creation of RFP and RFI responses for prospective new clients
  

**What We Need From You:**


* Bachelor’s in related field, or equivalent combination of experience and education
* Minimum 6 years of Sales Engineer experience or equivalent
* Ability to be strategic towards business outcomes as well as manage and handle day-to-day details and deadlines
* Strong team orientation with a history of working collaboratively in a fast paced environment
* Ability to manage multiple projects at once and prioritize activities
* Thorough knowledge of MS Office software including Excel, Word, & Power Point
* Well-developed business ethics and the ability to maintain a high level of discretion
* Self-motivated and strong drive to succeed
* Solid knowledge on different communication protocols (e.g. APIs, SFTP, AS2 etc. as well as different delivery formats (e.g. IDOC, EDIFACT, XML, UBL etc).
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.
* Multiple language skills preferred
* Moderate travel required for client meetings, trade shows, Sovos Events, and special projects
* Essential Job Functions:
	+ Interact effectively with teammates, colleagues and customers
	+ Comprehend and communicate complex concepts
	+ Concentrate, analyse and resolve complex problems
	+ Utilise technology (e.g. phone systems, computer hardware and software applications) to fulfil work requirements

**What Does Sovos Offer You?**


The tools to enhance your life - because we want you to enjoy your life outside of work and inside!


* An opportunity to work with a global team
* Bi-Weekly Meeting Free Days!
* Mentoring Programs
* Globally recognised Training and Development programs
* Benefits

*Sovos is an equal opportunity employer committed to providing an environment that celebrates diversity and where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and employees. We do not discriminate against race, color, religions, national origin, age, sex, marital status, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic provided by law. At Sovos, all employees are encouraged to bring their whole selves to work.*

  

**Company Background**


Sovos is a global provider of tax, compliance and trust solutions and services that enable businesses to navigate an increasingly regulated world with true confidence. Purpose-built for always-on compliance capabilities, our scalable IT-driven solutions meet the demands of an evolving and complex global regulatory landscape. Sovos’ cloud-based software platform provides an unparalleled level of integration with business applications and government compliance processes.


More than 100,000 customers in 100+ countries – including half the Fortune 500 – trust Sovos for their compliance needs. Sovos annually processes more than three billion transactions across 19,000 global tax jurisdictions. Bolstered by a robust partner program more than 400 strong, Sovos brings to bear an unrivaled global network for companies across industries and geographies. Founded in 1979, Sovos has operations across the Americas and Europe, and is owned by Hg and TA Associates. For more information visit http://www.sovos.com and follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter.


#LI-Remote

title: Kommunikatör
description:
STR-T består av 4-5 personer inom kansli samt projektanställning. STR-T leds av en styrelse samt verksamhetsledare, uppföljning och avstämning sker regelbundet.
  
  

Dina arbetsuppgifter blir framför allt att identifiera och analysera kommunikationsbehov, planera och genomföra kommunikationsaktiviteter samt följa upp resultat i nära samarbete med kollegor och ledning.
  
Du ger råd och operativt stöd i intern och extern kommunikation. Vidare producerar du innehåll för webb och andra plattformar, både i våra gemensamma strukturer och vid den enskilda.
  
En särskild uppgift i ditt arbete blir att förstärka och utveckla ett nära samarbete med andra kommunikatörer i andra gemensamma funktioner.
  
**För att bidra till STR-T:** s goda samarbete och effektivitet ska du ta fram en långsiktig kommunikationsstrategi och rutiner för hur vi inom STR-T ska kommunicera med våra målgrupper. Är du den vi söker?
  
  

**Utbildning/erfarenhet:** Du ska ha en akademisk examen inom medie- och kommunikationsvetenskap, marknadsföring eller annan likvärdig examen.
  
För att lyckas i rollen har du arbetat med strategisk kommunikation samt har mycket goda kunskaper i det svenska språket, både i tal och skrift.
  
Vidare ser vi att du har arbetat med strategisk planering och utvärdering av kommunikationsinsatser och har erfarenhet om metoder och verktyg för arbetet.
  
Du är van att arbeta med externt kommunikationsarbete med målgruppsanpassade budskap, skriva artiklar, pressmeddelanden samt arbeta med sociala medier och digitala kanaler, goda kunskaper i verktyg inom webbpublicering - goda kunskaper i Adobe Creative Cloud eller motsvarande goda kunskaper i Officepaketet - mycket god förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift samt målgruppsanpassning av texter - kunskaper i krav på tillgänglighet för webbinnehåll.
  
Dina personliga egenskaper är mycket viktiga. Du är en lagspelare som är bra på att skapa och bibehålla goda relationer. Du jobbar på ett strukturerat sätt och kan prioritera ditt arbete. Du kommunicerar tydligt och pedagogiskt med både interna och externa samarbetspartners.
  
Vi fäster stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper och ser det som en självklarhet att du bidrar till ett gott samarbete och arbetsklimat. Som medarbetare på STR-T behöver du - ha förmåga att fatta beslut med hänsyn till flera perspektiv (helhetssyn) - förstå att en central roll för STR-T är att göra avvägningar mellan olika intressen - ha förmåga att prioritera och ställa om för att arbeta med nya uppgifter eller i nya sammanhang. Det är meriterande om du har - erfarenhet av och kunskap om den meänkielitalande minoriteten samt kunskaper i meänkieli. Kunskaper i övrig lagstiftning som berör innehåll på webbplats som exempelvis dataskyddsförordningen.

title: Information Security Officer - Off Board Vehicle Systems
description:
**The opportunity**


We are looking for an Information Security Officer to support Polestar’s vehicle programs with Off Board Vehicle System’s security. The IT landscape complexity is growing and in Information Security we need to keep the company and its vehicles safe from a diverse set of threats.


This position is located at our Gothenburg, Sweden offices. We believe in a hybrid model when it comes to remote and onsite work, knowing that both in-person collaboration and individual time to focus are needed. What matters most is that people get the time, and support, to do what needs to be done. And to enjoy doing it, of course.

 **The responsibilities**


Information Security Officers at Polestar design and improve Information Security Capabilities, handle incident management, vulnerability management, and security monitoring. They ensure the integration of security processes across departments, support risk tracking, and collaborate with other teams. They report to the CISO and are accountable for integrated status and future development tracking of the Information Security Capabilities.


See below for a more thorough breakdown of the various tasks and areas you'll be responsible for:


* Oversee and govern InfoSec Capabilities or Services per the InfoSec Strategy.
* Define and set standards and practices for responsible areas.
* Establish and align Key Performance Indicators (KPI) with organizational goals.
* Support Risk Management, Risk Analysis, and stakeholder consultations on Risk Treatment.
* Formulate tactical goals and translate them into operational plans.
* Contribute to strategic planning and governance decisions.
* Ensure alignment and handovers within InfoSec Teams.
* Manage stakeholders and promote InfoSec Culture.
* Deliver tailored Awareness and Training programs.
* Coordinate capabilities, ecosystems, and market-specific deployments.
* Collect, aggregate, and monitor InfoSec Risk Data.

Collaborate with R&D, Product Security and Digital teams for the implementation of security controls for off board vehicle systems.  
* 

  

**The ideal candidate**


We seek a patient, open individual who excels at informing, motivating, and training others. This high-energy person embraces trust, transparency, and innovation, constantly seeking improvements. With strong communication skills, they align the organization on technical decisions, balance quality with pragmatism, and connect thinkers for efficient work. They effectively translate between digital business and Information Security stakeholders.


It is essential that you have experience in one or more of the following areas:



* Experience in rolling out SDLC processes and expertise in Cloud, Mobile, or Embedded/Car systems, with skills in threat modelling, secure coding, and aligning development practices with security requirements and compliance.


* Possess expertise in PKI and symmetric systems, key management, HSMs, and cryptographic usability, with the ability to train others on selecting appropriate crypto types and understanding the implications of symmetric vs. asymmetric keys in processes like enrolment.


* Possess experience in Automotive Product Security, CSMS, asset management, and risk management and threat modelling, with a strong understanding of the current threat landscape, effective protection methods, and the ability to incorporate legal requirements into solutions.
  

In addition, you'll need the following qualifications/experience:


* University degree in relevant subject area in relation to Information Security
* More than four years of experience working in Product Security or digital organizations and Information Security
* History of adapting industry standard enterprise-wide security technologies and concepts to technology and business defined scopes
* Knowledge of relevant industry standards (e.g., NIST 800-53, ISO 27001, ISO 27018, ISO 21434)
* Knowledge of automotive security regulations (e.g. UNECE R155)


Polestar is an international company, with various backgrounds represented. English, therefore, is the language of written and spoken communication. And though we have a global presence, we maintain the growth-mindset. Change happens often at Polestar. But so does progress. Expect an accelerating, exciting environment.  



  

**The process**


If the above matches your ambitions, be sure to apply. Our selection process is ongoing, and the job advert will remain open until it’s filled.


The Polestar journey is an electric one.

title: Engineering Manager TourOps Platform till Ving (NLTG)
description:
***Är du en IT-ledare som brinner för att utveckla både människor och organisationer? Gillar du att skapa framgångsrika team som levererar kundvärde och som bidrar till innovation i ett företag som är marknadsledande inom semesterresor och ligger i framkant i sin IT-utveckling? Då har vi rollen för dig!***

***Hos oss på Ving (Nordic Leisure Travel Group) får du möjligheten att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där vi kombinerar starkt tekniskt kunnande med passion för att ge våra kunder fantastiska upplevelser. Vi är ett företag där vi har roligt tillsammans, där vi bryr oss om varandra, och där vi alltid strävar efter att vara ”the leading holiday and experience company dedicated to well-being.” Låter det som något för dig? Läs vidare!***

### **Om tjänsten**


Som Engineering Manager kommer att tillhöra Business IT, vår digitala utvecklingsorganisation med ca 100 anställda och 13 utvecklingsteam.


Du kommer att vara en nyckelspelare i vår fortsatta digitala resa. Hos oss får du arbeta nära andra engagerade ledare och medarbetare för att skapa en digital utvecklingsorganisation i framkant. Vi verkar primärt i Microsoft-miljö, där vi kommit långt i vår cloud-resa.


Du kommer att ansvara för medarbetare inom utvecklingsteamen ”CRM, Payments & Marketing”, ”Finance” samt ”Business Intelligence”. Det övergripande uppdraget för team inom området Business Service är att erbjuda de bästa tjänsterna och applikationerna för att stötta och skapa värde för olika delar av verksamheten.


* Team CRM, Payments & Marketing ansvarar för NLTGS CRM-system, betalflöden och marknad
* Team Finance stödjer verksamheten i finansiell hantering av bokning, fakturor, avstämning och rapportering av intäkter, kostnader & betalningar för tour operator.
* Team BI stödjer verksamheten i att ta datadrivna beslut via rapportering, analys och insikter. Utbildar self-service användare att jobba smartare med data som exempelvis AI-lösningar.

**Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden:**

* Ansvara för ca 15 medarbetare och säkerställa teamens set-up och kompetensutveckling för att möta våra affärsmål.
* Leda och coacha medarbetarna för att bygga högpresterande och självständiga team.
* Du ingår i ett ledningsteam som består av fem Engineering Managers som tillsammans driver strategiska och operativa frågor.
* Du är också en del av tvärfunktionella ledningsteam inom ditt ansvarsområde tillsammans med bland annat Chief Product Owner och Produktägare.
* Ansvar för arbetsprocesser inom ditt ansvarsområde.
* Driva och vara sponsor för initiativ som förbättrar våra arbetssätt, kompetensutveckling, stärker vårt nätverk och bygger en positiv företagskultur.

  

Rollen utgår från vårt huvudkontor som är beläget i Marieberg vid DN-skrapan på Kungsholmen i Stockholm. Vi erbjuder en hybrid arbetsmodell där du har möjlighet att arbeta hemifrån någon eller ett par dagar i veckan. Vi värdesätter flexibilitet, men prioriterar det som bäst gynnar teamet och verksamheten.

### **Vem vi söker**

**För att kvalificera dig för rollen har du:**

* Flera års erfarenhet som chef med personalansvar för agila utvecklingsteam.
* Erfarenhet av att coacha och utveckla grupper och individer.
* Erfarenhet av att driva förändringsarbete och organisationsutveckling.
* God engelska och svenska i tal och skrift.

**Det är meriterande om du även:**


Har intresse och kunskap inom något eller flera av nedanstående:

* Facilitera workshops.
* Utbilda exempelvis inom arbetssätt och metoder.
* Driva forum för exempelvis utvecklingsprocesser, arbetsmetodik eller motsvarande.
* Teknisk kompetens och erfarenhet av att leda specialister inom IT
* Erfarenhet som utvecklare är också ett plus.

 **Personliga egenskaper**  

  

Som person är du en stabil och naturlig ledare med förmågan att inspirera och motivera. Du är lyhörd och gillar att coacha och utveckla både individer och team och trivs i en miljö där samarbete och ständiga förbättringar står i fokus. Du är kommunikativ och lösningsfokuserad och du har förmåga att bygga förtroende, nätverka och bygga välfungerande samarbeten mellan avdelningar.


Du ser till helheten och kan kommunicera visioner på ett effektivt sätt. Du har en stark förmåga att förstå komplexa sammanhang och brinner för att skapa helhetsperspektiv som driver utvecklingen av en digital avdelning i framkant. Du drivs av att ständigt förbättra och utveckla processer för att nå bästa resultat. Du gillar att bidra till att skapa värde genom teknik och innovation.

### **Vi erbjuder**


Vi är i en spännande förändringsfas där både organisationen och rollerna utvecklas. Det här är en möjlighet för dig som vill vara med och forma framtiden, påverka arbetssätt och skapa långsiktig framgång tillsammans med ett starkt EM-team och engagerade kollegor.  

  

Du får en omväxlande vardag tillsammans med härliga kollegor - vi arbetar i nära samarbete mellan de nordiska länderna för att ge våra gäster de bästa veckorna på året. Vi har dessutom ett högt medarbetarengagemang som år efter år visar sig i vår interna medarbetarundersökning. Vi älskar vårt jobb och välkomnar dig ombord på vår resa i Nordic Leisure Travel Group!

### **Ansökan och intresse**

  

Har vi lyckats fånga ditt intresse? Då ser vi fram emot att höra från dig!


För denna rekrytering behandlar vi ansökningar löpande så vänta inte med att skicka din ansökan.


Tester kommer att vara en del av processen för kandidater som når de avslutande stegen i rekryteringen. För att säkerställa en trygg rekrytering genomför vi bakgrundskontroll innan anställning.  

  

***I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av tester från Alva Labs – ett logiskt problemlösningstest och ett personlighetstest. Testerna utgår från vedertagen forskning och ger oss möjlighet att på ett opartiskt sätt bedöma dina styrkor och eventuella utmaningar i relation till aktuell tjänst. Under rekryteringsprocessen kommer du att få testerna skickade till dig med mer information, är du nyfiken redan nu kan du läsa mer om dem hos*** ***Alva Labs******.***

title: Data Analyst
description:
**Freelance Opportunity: Data Analyst (Based in Sweden) - Swedish speaker position** 




  





 Are you a talented
 **Data Analyst** 
 with expertise in
 **GCP, SQL, DBT, and Tableau** 
 ? Do you thrive in dynamic environments and have a knack for turning data into actionable insights? If you’re based in Sweden and looking for an exciting freelance role, we want to hear from you!
 



  





**About the Role**




 We are seeking a
 **Freelance Data Analyst** 
 to join our team for an engaging project in Stockholm. The role requires
 **2-3 days on-site** 
 per week, with the flexibility of remote work for the rest.
 



  





**What We’re Looking For**



* **Skills** 
 : Proficiency in
 **Google Cloud Platform (GCP)** 
 ,
 **SQL** 
 ,
 **DBT** 
 , and
 **Tableau** 
 .
* **Languages** 
 : Fluent in both
 **English** 
 and
 **Swedish** 
 .
* **Experience** 
 : Retail experience is a plus, but not mandatory.



  





**Why Join Us?**



* Work on impactful projects in a collaborative environment.
* Flexible freelance arrangement with part-time on-site work in
 **Stockholm** 
 .
* Fast-track hiring process: just
 **one interview** 
 and an
 **offer** 
 !



  





**Your Responsibilities**



* Analyze and visualize complex datasets to deliver actionable insights.
* Work closely with stakeholders to support data-driven decision-making.
* Utilize tools like GCP, SQL, DBT, and Tableau to streamline workflows.



  





 Ready to make your mark in data analytics? Don’t wait—this role is filling quickly!
 



  





 📩 Apply now or share your profile to take the next step in your freelance journey.
 



 Let’s create something amazing together! 🚀

title: Hybrid Infrastructure Engineer
description:
**Company Description**
 We are in Business for People, empowering people in service organizations with innovative Enterprise and Business software solutions. We’ve innovated and taken a new approach to delivering ERP that works for people. Self-driving, adaptive and intuitive software that is changing the way people work. Our solutions empower people and deliver a better people experience so people can spend time on meaningful high value work they live for.
   

  

 Read more on our website about how we transform work and how people feel about it, so our customers and their people can thrive.
   

  

**Job Description**
 The Global Cloud Infrastructure Team is seeking a skilled Hybrid Cloud Operations Engineer to join our international team. As part of this dynamic team, you will play a key role in supporting our commercial offerings. Unit4 operates a sophisticated infrastructure spanning Microsoft Azure and on-premises data centers in Sweden. In this role, you will primarily work with Windows Server Virtual Machines deployed on VMware while also assisting in the setup of virtual networks and Azure native solutions.
   

  

**Qualifications**
**Required:**
* 3+ years of relevant experience
* General knowledge of Windows Server architecture and Active Directory
* Experience with VMware and virtualization technologies
* Hands-on experience with physical data centers, including cabling, moving components, etc.
* Flexibility to work outside of office hours and participate in weekend on-call support.
* Strong prioritization skills, both independently and as part of a team
* Proficient troubleshooting skills, with the ability to resolve complex issues
* Passion for learning new technologies and exploring innovative ideas
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills for engaging with internal and external customers


**Nice to Have:**
* Familiarity with Microsoft Azure & Microsoft certifications
* Experience with Dell Servers, Cisco Network devices
* Experience automating Windows systems using PowerShell or similar methods
* Knowledge of networking (VPN setup), file transfer servers, Microsoft SQL, and PKI infrastructure
* Experience with AWS


**Additional Information**
* Remote work option
* Employment contract
* Stable employment with an attractive salary
* Unlimited paid holidays
* Various benefits including private medical care, Multisport, and pre-paid cards
* Opportunity to work in an international department and collaborate with colleagues from diverse cultural backgrounds
* Participation in the development of a leading international software firm
* Freedom and autonomy to succeed, with an unlimited vacation policy that focuses on results


 At Unit4, you will join a team of enthusiastic professionals dedicated to personal and professional growth. If you are excited about working in a challenging international environment and making a meaningful impact, we encourage you to apply.
   

  

**This role may require security clearance required for customer projects and access to sensitive (customer) data. That means that after you have accepted our offer, we could ask for background checks. Subject to applicable local laws, such security checks may require disclosure of personal information including criminal record declaration, right to work, personal identification and work history. No worries though – we'll handle it according to local privacy laws and keep your info safe. Questions? Feel free to reach out!**

 At Unit4 we invest in your personal and professional growth. We don't focus on how many days you work, we trust you on delivering results - thus, we have an unlimited vacation policy.

title: Technical Product Manager - Shared Components (Real Time Communication)
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**About The Role**
 We're seeking a highly motivated and experienced Technical Product Manager to own and drive the roadmap and requirements for critical shared components within our Real Time Communication product suite. You will be the key link between engineering, product and product operation stakeholders, ensuring alignment and successful delivery of impactful solutions.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Our Real-Time Communication team is building the future of real time communication for enterprises! We're passionate about creating seamless and engaging experiences across a suite of products that connect people worldwide. This includes programmable voice, in-app calling, verification, number lookup and fax solutions. All of these products generate billions of events every year that results in insightful and business critical data both for us at Sinch and for our customers. As we continue to grow and innovate, we need a talented Technical Product Manager to lead the charge of our platform team, Shared Components.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Define and implement a strategy for collecting, analysing, and leveraging AI and usage data across all RTCx products.
* Define roadmap and requirements for our common financial and business intelligence pipelines.
* Define roadmap and requirements for our configuration tool used for operating all RTCx products.
* Work closely with product managers across different RTCx products and Sinch to ensure seamless integration and consistent data model and standard.
* Provide technical guidance and support to the engineering team, contributing to architectural decisions and technology choices.


**Requirements**
* Professional experience as a Technical Product Manager with a focus on backend systems, data platforms or API based products.
* Experience of defining and detailing requirements.
* Strong knowledge of data flows, billing, account management, and configuration tools in large-scale systems.
* Proven track record of managing complex, cross-functional projects with a focus on scaling and reliability.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and various stakeholders.
* Technical background or experience with backend development, data infrastructure and analytics is highly preferred.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to deep dive into the technical details and complexity.
* Familiarity with data privacy regulations (e.g. GDPR) and AI.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Artificial Intelligence Consultant
description:
Hello Network!
 



  





  





 I hope you're doing well today,
 



  





  





**We are currently recruiting for an interesting hybrid working Artificial Intelligence Consultant role for a major Swedish Federal client in Solna, Sweden:** 




  





  





**Duration: 12 months + extensions** 




**Location: Solna (Hybrid Working)** 




**Pay Rate: Negotiable** 




**English & Swedish Speaking** 




  





  





**If you know anyone that could be suitable we offer referral rewards for a successful placement.** 




  





  





**Job Role:** 




  





  




* In a time of rapid technological development and increasing digitalization, the Client's Innovation Lab is keen to explore the potential of artificial intelligence (AI) to streamline and modernize the user experience. Therefore, the Client's Innovation Lab has begun work with test pilots to evaluate the use of AI technology in various areas.



  





  





**Must-Requirements:** 




  





  




* At least competence level 3 (4-8 years).
* Two (2) years of practical and documented experience in building applications on existing AI models.
* One (1) year of practical and documented experience in Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).
* Two (2) years of practical and documented experience in implementing and using AI models, including language models.
* Two (2) years of practical and documented experience working with AI services and technologies in Microsoft Azure.
* Two (2) years of practical and documented experience with open-source models such as Mistral and Llama.
* Two (2) years of practical and documented experience working with programming languages such as Python or equivalent.
* Two (2) years of practical and proven experience using AI frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or equivalent.
* Two (2) years of practical and documented experience working with data collection, washing, pre-treatment, analysis and interpretation.
* Two (2) years of practical and documented experience in following guidelines or equivalent regarding information security and data protection.



  





  





**Should requirements:** 




  





  




* The quoted consultant should have experience of working with statistics and database technology.
* The quoted consultant should have experience of previous assignments of a project management nature.
* The quoted consultant should have experience of working in a politically controlled organization.



  





  





 If you are interested, or you know someone who could be please reach out and we can arrange a time to speak?

title: Pre-Sales Engineer (e-Invoicing)
description:
**Build your future with Sovos.**
 If you're seeking a career where innovation meets impact, you've come to the right place. As a global leader, Sovos is transforming tax compliance from a business requirement to a force for growth while revolutionising how businesses navigate the ever-changing regulatory landscape.
   

  

 At Sovos, we're dedicated to more than just solving compliance challenges – we're committed to making a positive and lasting difference in everything we do. Our teams operate on the modern edge of digital technology, working not only to solve complex business challenges but also to enrich our personal, professional, and local communities.
   

  

 Our purpose-built systems provide the tools you need to thrive in a world where governments demand increased visibility, faster reporting and greater control over business processes. Excited about the possibilities? So are we!
   

  

 Don’t worry if you don't check all the boxes – apply anyway! We're focused on hiring the right people, not just the "right" resume. It's not about what you've done elsewhere; it's all about what you're capable of doing here.
   

  

**The Work You'll Do**
 The Pre-Sales Engineer (e-Invoicing) will work with the Direct Sales and Alliance teams to provide technical support during the sales cycle for our relevant solutions within Sovos’ Indirect Tax Technology Suite (ITTS). The Pre-Sales Engineer (e-Invoicing) acts as the bridge between sales and product, professional services & support, utilizing technical expertise to support the sales team and deliver solutions that meet customer needs.
   

  

 The Pre-Sales Engineer (e-Invoicing) will be adept at leveraging technical expertise to deliver innovative solutions, ensuring a seamless integration of product offerings with client needs. Also, this role possesses strong communication, enabling effective cross-functional collaboration and the successful execution of complex sales initiatives. Known for developing robust sales strategies, conducting impactful product demonstrations, and providing comprehensive technical support to both clients and internal sales teams. The Pre-Sales Engineer (e-Invoicing) will report to the Sales Engineering Manager – Europe.
   

  

**More Specifically You Will**
* Provide superior domain expertise around ITTS solutions
* Maintain expert level understanding of functionality and technical architecture of our products
* Assist in the client discovery process to help uncover unforeseen challenges and desired solution architecture. Also conduct reviews of discovery questionnaires to ensure customer landscape knowledge is documented and any other sales opportunities are identified
* Develop a firm understanding of customer needs, pain points, and requirements around the ITTS and align Sovos solutions to fulfill the needs and requirements to eliminate the pain
* Work closely with Sovos’ Sales to conduct sales and solutions presentations
* Collaborate with Professional Services and product functions to ensure a successful onboarding post sale
* Maintain and continually improve demonstration capabilities in order to be able to present to customers a compelling and coherent narrative as to the key features and benefits of Sovos solutions
* Conduct in-depth technical presentations and product demonstrations to prospects and clients.
* Act with integrity and demonstrate ethical behavior in all matters with all stakeholders
* Take full responsibility for ensuring internal and external customer satisfaction
* Demonstrate a high degree of self-awareness and commitment to personal development and learning
* Focus on process improvement, adept at optimizing sales workflows and driving efficiency to enhance revenue growth and customer satisfaction.
* Develop and lead training sessions both within and outside the Sales Engineer department
* Serve as a subject matter expert surrounding the creation of RFP and RFI responses for prospective new clients


**What We Need From You**
* Bachelor’s in related field, or equivalent combination of experience and education
* Minimum 6 years of Sales Engineer experience or equivalent
* Ability to be strategic towards business outcomes as well as manage and handle day-to-day details and deadlines
* Strong team orientation with a history of working collaboratively in a fast paced environment
* Ability to manage multiple projects at once and prioritize activities
* Thorough knowledge of MS Office software including Excel, Word, & Power Point
* Well-developed business ethics and the ability to maintain a high level of discretion
* Self-motivated and strong drive to succeed
* Solid knowledge on different communication protocols (e.g. APIs, SFTP, AS2 etc. as well as different delivery formats (e.g. IDOC, EDIFACT, XML, UBL etc).
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.
* Multiple language skills preferred
* Moderate travel required for client meetings, trade shows, Sovos Events, and special projects
* Essential Job Functions:
+ Interact effectively with teammates, colleagues and customers
+ Comprehend and communicate complex concepts
+ Concentrate, analyse and resolve complex problems
+ Utilise technology (e.g. phone systems, computer hardware and software applications) to fulfil work requirements


**What Does Sovos Offer You?**
 The tools to enhance your life - because we want you to enjoy your life outside of work and inside!
   

  

* An opportunity to work with a global team
* Bi-Weekly Meeting Free Days!
* Mentoring Programs
* Globally recognised Training and Development programs
* Benefits


*Sovos is an equal opportunity employer committed to providing an environment that celebrates diversity and where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and employees. We do not discriminate against race, color, religions, national origin, age, sex, marital status, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic provided by law. At Sovos, all employees are encouraged to bring their whole selves to work.*
**Company Background**
 Sovos is a global provider of tax, compliance and trust solutions and services that enable businesses to navigate an increasingly regulated world with true confidence. Purpose-built for always-on compliance capabilities, our scalable IT-driven solutions meet the demands of an evolving and complex global regulatory landscape. Sovos’ cloud-based software platform provides an unparalleled level of integration with business applications and government compliance processes.
   

  

 More than 100,000 customers in 100+ countries – including half the Fortune 500 – trust Sovos for their compliance needs. Sovos annually processes more than three billion transactions across 19,000 global tax jurisdictions. Bolstered by a robust partner program more than 400 strong, Sovos brings to bear an unrivaled global network for companies across industries and geographies. Founded in 1979, Sovos has operations across the Americas and Europe, and is owned by Hg and TA Associates. For more information visit http://www.sovos.com and follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter.

title: Senior Project Manager
description:
**What We Can Offer**
* The possibility to help create and shape a brand-new business.
* Opportunities to work on prestigious assignments with established Swedish and international companies, as well as start-ups.
* The chance to work with senior professionals from the IT consulting world as well as data consultants, management consultants and all aspects of the Newground Alliance.
* Support from a strong existing alliance of consulting companies, which combines stability, experience and reputation with dynamism, agility and a true start-up feel.
* A home in amazing offices located at Norrmalmstorg, Stockholm where social gatherings, sports activities and interesting training opportunities are business as usual.
* An attractive, competitive and flexible compensation packages which match your experience, your situation, and your needs.


**What We Are Looking For**
* A minimum of five years of project or delivery management experience, ideally from delivery closely connected to tech and IT.
* Great project management skills, including managing scope, stakeholders and budget, while keeping track of schedules, milestones, and dependencies, and the right team to deliver.
* Experience from agile delivery models, e.g., SAFe or more traditional project models.
* An understanding of the driving forces of business and how technology enables success, including the time, cost and complexity involved in making it happen.
* Management of technical deliveries, potentially in software development, platform implementation or cloud infrastructure.
* Potentially hands-on tech experience as a developer, business analyst or architect.


**Who Is Stelltec**
 Stelltec is a consulting company focused on IT delivery management, founded in 2022. We are building a team of experienced, delivery-focused IT consultants with the skills, know-how and passion for taking on our clients’ most challenging projects – maximizing the value of their IT investments.
   

  

 Our team brings vast experience, deep knowledge and thorough understanding of what it takes to drive software, platform and technology implementations to successful completion. Stelltec has the skills our clients need to gain momentum, drive business value and achieve great results by enabling their tech organization to succeed.
   

  

 We’ll make it stellar. Together.
   

  

 We look forward to your application!
   

  

 We are a consulting company focused on IT delivery management. We are a team of experienced, delivery-focused IT consultants with the skills, know-how and passion for taking on our clients’ most challenging projects – maximizing the value of their IT investments. Read more at www.stelltec.se

title: Senior Customer Solutions Manager, AGS EMEA, Europe North, CSM
job_function: Project Management, Information Technology, and Product Management
description:
**Description**
 Senior Customer Solutions Manager
   

  

 As an Amazon Web Services (AWS) Senior Customer Solutions Manager you will be responsible for helping guide the largest and most complex AWS customers along their multi-year journey to the cloud. In this highly visible position you will ensure that all AWS teams are working together effectively and efficiently to deliver outcomes for the customer.
   

  

 In the role, you will be a critical strategic partner to our customers, leveraging your delivery experience with large scale transformations and helping shepherd them through their stages of AWS adoption. Guiding the customer through the operational, educational and governance aspects of a successful AWS cloud journey.
   

  

 You will interface with customer and AWS senior leadership, driving collaboration between the other core account groups (Sales, Support, Solutions Architecture and Professional Services), product/engineering teams, and customer teams; planning and supporting major workload migrations. You will translate strategic initiatives into executable actions, working backwards from our customers key milestones. The execution of education plans, roadmap to business outcome alignments, Executive Briefing Sessions, go-live events and transitions are a few items owned by the CSM that are critical to the success of our customer’s cloud journey.
   

  

 At AWS, you are encouraged to think big, invent and take ownership on customer challenges. You will not only bring the best of AWS/ Amazon to our customers, you will proactively help solve the customer’s challenges through new ideas, tools and mechanisms.
   

  

 Successful candidates will have a strong delivery and change management background, be detail oriented, have excellent problem-solving abilities, and be exemplary communicators both at the executive and project team level. You will be a peer leader, have the ability to gain stakeholder buy-in, negotiate and lead teams. Your enterprise experience and operational excellence will influence the team’s decisions, provide insight, and help drive secure and robust solutions.
   

  

 You will evangelize AWS services and influence customers for adopting them. You should be passionate about delivering a great customer experience by deploying AWS solutions and inspiring innovation. You will be obsessed with contributing to the day-to-day management of your customers successful adoption of AWS.
   

  

 Do you look around corners for ways to engage and service customers? Are you passionate about using technology to solve business problems that have big customer impact?
   

  

 Come build the future with us.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
 Basic Qualifications
   

  

* Experience leading complex, large scale IT/digital/business transformation programs
* Experience in a senior customer facing role
* Superior written and verbal communication skills, including a demonstrated ability to effectively deliver information to C-suite/VP level
* Strong organizational and troubleshooting skills with precise attention to detail


**Preferred Qualifications**
 Preferred Qualifications
   

  

* Direct experience implementing AWS/cloud services
* Robust understanding of key technology and market trends
* PMP and/or SCRUM/Agile, SAFe certified
* Deep understanding of any of the following industries: Financial Services, Retail, Manufacturing, Media & Entertainment, Games, Healthcare & Lifesciences


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)
   

  

 Job ID: A2719348
